pkgmetadata.longdescription: # melpoi[![PyPI Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/melpoi.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/melpoi/)[![release](https://github.com/la0bing/melpoi/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/la0bing/melpoi/actions/workflows/release.yml)melpoi is a python library to mainly to speed up data discovery, data analyzing, etc.# Get Started```pip install melpoi```# Categories- [SQL](https://github.com/la0bing/melpoi/tree/master/melpoi/sql)- [DataFrame](https://github.com/la0bing/melpoi/tree/master/melpoi/dataframe)# Work in progress- Dataset auto analyzer- AutoML
